bibl.title: To See God. Conflicting Exegetical Tendencies in the Septuagint.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 295-299: IV. An Egyptian background for the tendency to introduce the notion of seeing God?; - V. Other marks of Egyptian influence in the Septuagint; - VI. Conclusions.
